testcase.name: does a receiver receive a message sent
testcase.system-out: Given Bob, age 35 with the email bob@email.com is on the messenger..........passed And Sarah, age 37 with the email sarah@email.com is on the messenger........passed When "bob@email.com" sends the message "Hello sarah, how are you" to "sarah@email.com".passed Then "Sarah" receives the message "Hello sarah, how are you" from "Bob".....passed
